## Biography
Florian Ricour is a marine data scientist, specialized in machine learning, biogeochemical modeling and data visualization tools. During his PhD, he developed an embedded zooplankton classification algorithm for autonomous underwater vehicles and reassessed the global carbon sequestration of the Biological Carbon Pump using a continuous approach to carbon storage. His postdoc at RBINS focuses now on the development of biogeochemical models using innovative tools such as [FABM](https://github.com/fabm-model/fabm).
